TABLE.NAME: tool_metadata
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for tool_metadata, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: filecontenthash
FIELD.COMMENT: The content hash of the file metadata is associated with.

FIELD.NAME: creator
FIELD.COMMENT: The person or organization primarily responsible for creating the intellectual content of the resource.

FIELD.NAME: contributor
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma delimited string of persons or organizations not specified in the creator who have made significant intellectual contributions to the resource.

FIELD.NAME: creationdate
FIELD.COMMENT: A UNIX epoch for date/time associated with the creation or availability of the resource.

FIELD.NAME: format
FIELD.COMMENT: The MIME type of the resource, in accordance with IANA Media Types.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the available types from the DCMI Type Vocabulary.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The name given to the resource, usually by the creator or publisher.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A textual description of the content of the resource.

FIELD.NAME: publisher
FIELD.COMMENT: The entity responsible for making the resource available in its present form.

FIELD.NAME: rights
FIELD.COMMENT: A rights management statement, link to a rights management statement, or link to a service providing information about rights management for the resource.

FIELD.NAME: extractor
FIELD.COMMENT: The pluginname of the metadata extractor plugin used to create this metadata record.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX epoch date/time that this record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX epoch date/time that this record was modified.
